sources.title: Eternal Evil
sources.description: A dissatisfied Montreal director of TV commercials is taught to astrally project himself by a mysterious woman. But soon he finds that he does it against his will when he sleeps, and while he does it, he commits savage acts against those in his life.

sources.title: Eternal Evil
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

metadata.Plot: A dissatisfied Montreal director of TV commercials is taught to astrally project himself by a mysterious woman. But soon he finds that he does it against his will when he sleeps, and while he does it, he commits savage acts against those in his life.
metadata.Actors: Winston Rekert, Karen Black, John Novak
